name: writeepi
author: Writeepi
description: Simple, accessible but powerful all-in-one word-processing and organization app for writers

scripts.build: npm run build:version && tsc && npm run copy-files && npm run copy-app && npm run copy-resources
scripts.start: set ELECTRON_ENABLE_LOGGING=1 && npm run build && electron dist/desktop/src/main.js
scripts.start:buildfront: cd ../webui && npm run buildprod && cd ../desktop && npm run start
scripts.copy-files: copyfiles -u 1 src/*.png dist/desktop/src/ && copyfiles -u 1 src/*.gif dist/desktop/src/ && copyfiles -u 1 src/*.ico dist/desktop/src/ && copyfiles -u 1 src/*.icns dist/desktop/src/
scripts.make: npm run clean && npm run build && electron-forge make
